T02TD3665E:268b-1: sha tam aashta s'a dha nam /
T02TD3665E:268b-3: sgrub thabs brgya dang brgyad pa /
T02TD3665E:268b-4: btsam ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3665E:268b-5: bla ma'i drin thob ba rtul zhugs ldan //
T02TD3665E:268b-6: bla med ye shes sgrub pa pos //
T02TD3665E:268b-7: ri bo dben zhing yid 'ong bar //
T02TD3665E:268b-8: rin chen sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing //
T02TD3665E:268b-9: ljon shing mang pos rab tu gang //
T02TD3665E:268b-10: skad snyan bya rnams sgra 'byin cing //
T02TD3665E:268b-11: chu gtsang yan lag brgyad ldan 'bab //
T02TD3665E:268b-12: ri dvags 'tshe ba med pa'i gnas //
T02TD3665E:268b-13: dri zhim me tog gis bkram pa'i //
T02TD3665E:268b-14: shing tog la sogs 'bras bu mang //
T02TD3665E:268b-15: lha klu la sogs glu len cing //
T02TD3665E:268b-16: grub 'dzin kun gyis gnas bcas pa //
T02TD3665E:268b-17: phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas der ni //
T02TD3665E:268b-18: sngags pas kun la phan brtson pas //
T02TD3665E:268b-19: bde ba'i stan la bsdad nas ni //
T02TD3665E:268b-20: rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD3665E:268b-21: 'phags ma sgrol sogs spyan drangs te //
T02TD3665E:268b-22: mchod pa kun gyis rab mchod nas //
T02TD3665E:268b-23: bdun po rnam par dag par bya //
T02TD3665E:268b-24: de nas tshad med bzhi bsgoms pas //
T02TD3665E:268b-25: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
T02TD3665E:268b-26: 'gyur med phyin ci ma log pas //
T02TD3665E:268b-27: de dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul ni //
T02TD3665E:268b-28: stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgom //
T02TD3665E:268b-29: aom sva bh'a wa bi shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa bi shuddho& ham /
T02TD3665E:268b-30: padma zla bar yi ge t'am //
T02TD3665E:268b-31: de la 'jig rten gsum g-yo ba'i //
T02TD3665E:268b-32: sgrol ma zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa //
T02TD3665E:268b-33: dmar ser bzang po'i zhabs kyis zhugs //
T02TD3665E:268b-34: ser dang ljang bu dmar dang dkar//
T02TD3665E:269a-0: @269a * // rtsa zhal g-yas g-yon rgyab rim bzhin //
T02TD3665E:269a-1: mchog sbyin nyi ma gdugs dang dung //
T02TD3665E:269a-2: g-yas pa'i phyag na rim bzhin bsnams //
T02TD3665E:269a-3: autpala zhags pa phreng ba dang //

T02TD3665E:269a-8: zhes pas sku gsung thugs byin brlab //

T02TD3665E:269a-15: // / padma zla ba'i gdan la ni aom las byung ba'i sgrol ma nyi ma'i mdog can //

T02TD3665E:269a-22: // / padma dang zla ba'i gdan la h'um las byung ba'i sgrol ma /

T02TD3665E:269b-14: / blo 'phel ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so /

T02TD3665E:277b-21: // / padma dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du hri:las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /

T02TD3665E:277b-27: zhi mdzad ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so /
T02TD3665E:277b-29: // / de nas thub pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma ni /
T02TD3665E:277b-30: sngar bstan pa'i cho ga las bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du sa bon lnga pa'i sde tshan gyi dang po la dang po gnyis pas mnan la zla tshes phyed pa'i thig les brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3665E:277b-31: de las grub pa'i sgrol ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3665E:277b-32: mchog tu rnams par mdzes ma /
T02TD3665E:277b-33: zhal gcig pa yid du 'ong ba mo ljang gu phyag gnyis ma /
T02TD3665E:277b-34: g-yas mchog sbyin pa g-yon autpala 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD3665E:277b-35: padma dang zla ba la gnas pa rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan par bsam mo //
T02TD3665E:277b-36: lag pa nyis thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo'i sen mo bkab la srin lag nang du bcug stam mthe bong mnan pa ni autpala kha bye ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3665E:278a-1: tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD3665E:278a-2: de nas snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas dza:dang h'um la sogs pas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la gzhug cing dbang du bya'o //
T02TD3665E:278a-3: gnas gsum la ni rdo rje gsum //
T02TD3665E:278a-4: byin gyis rlabs la skul sogs //
T02TD3665E:278a-6: aom a'a:h'um las rtag pa dang ;
T02TD3665E:278a-7: /'od dpag med dang mi bskyod pa //
T02TD3665E:278a-8: de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las //
T02TD3665E:278a-10: nga ma'i tshul can spyan drangs te //
T02TD3665E:278a-11: dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag po ni /
T02TD3665E:278a-12: 'od dpag med kyis spyi bor brgyan //
T02TD3665E:278a-13: de nas sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02TD3665E:278a-14: 'od kyi lha yi spro bsdu las //
T02TD3665E:278a-15: skyon thugs ka'i sa bon las //
T02TD3665E:278a-17: bdag kyang sa bon de dag las //
T02TD3665E:278a-18: shin tu phra bar bsam mi khyab //
T02TD3665E:278a-19: rnam par mi rtog de dmigs shing //
T02TD3665E:278a-20: nam mkha'i dkyil ltar rab dben pa //
T02TD3665E:278a-21: bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD3665E:278a-22: de nas skyon bzlas pa ni //
T02TD3665E:278a-23: 'bum phrag bzhi'am 'on te drug /'bum phrag bcu yis las rnams 'grub //
T02TD3665E:278a-24: rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis //
T02TD3665E:278a-25: 'di don nyams su gang len pa //
T02TD3665E:278a-26: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba'i /
T02TD3665E:278a-27: sgrol ma yum mchog nyid gyur nas //
T02TD3665E:278a-29: yon tan dpag med 'byung bar gsungs //
T02TD3665E:278a-30: de ltar stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid srid pa gsum skyes zad nges shes dang ni //
T02TD3665E:278a-31: shes bya gnyis su med sku kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs yum //
T02TD3665E:278a-32: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs rgyud 'dzin legs bkod pa las bsod nams dri ma med //
T02TD3665E:278a-33: bdag gis gang thob des ni 'gro ba ma lus rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob shog / lha mo sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD3665E:278a-34: slob dpon chen po tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD3665E:278a-36: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02TD3665E:278a-37: lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o //
T02TD3665E:278a-38: slad kyis rgya gar gyi pandi ta d'a na sh'i la dang /
T02TD3665E:278a-39: bod kyi lo ts'a pa blo gros grags pas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//
